title: Why should technology as a partner play a greater role in the learning experiences of the majority? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because technology proved very beneficial especially in the time of Covid-19 lockdown. Without the technology, you wouldn’t have had the chance to keep the education and learning process going in such unexpected conditions of the lockdown. And with another wave of covid-19, you may expect to have another lockdown or may be because if anything else, it doesn’t have to be covid-19. With employing the proper educational technology platform, you can now upload the course material online for the students to download from their portal. You can upload the video lessons for your students to watch online from their portal. You can give the assignments for your students online and they can download them, answer them, submit the answers to you and you can grade them online. You can build the schedule/time table so that all your students will be able to view online. You can create online quiz for your students to sit for and the technology will grade the quiz automatically and reflects the marks into their grading report without any intervention from your side. More than this, you can meet your students online using the virtual classrooms tools that can provide you with even better experience than meeting your students face-to-face. You can share your webcam and use microphone, you can mute all students and only allow the one you want to talk, they can raise hands, you can share your screen, use multi-user white board, upload presentation, share documents, have discussions,…etc. A lot more than this the technology can provide and we are expecting more and more with the technology advancement in the near future.
